title: Bloomberg Markets: Scully on Rise in Auto Loan Fraud
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Scully on Rise in Auto Loan Fraud
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Matt Scully Consumer Finance Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing the auto loan fraud parallel to the housing bubble.
